smartAudits.sectionSubtitle: Diagnosis, vision, and strategy for your company's digital evolution.
smartAudits.sectionBody: At CelesteIQ, we believe that true digital transformation begins with clarity. Our intelligent audits combine expert knowledge of the Microsoft ecosystem with advanced AI-powered analysis to give you a real view of your company's technological state and help you build a solid strategy for the future. An audit is not just a technical review — it's the starting point for a smarter, safer, and more efficient business.
smartAudits.iwaSubtitle: Evaluate how your team works and discover how they can do it better.
smartAudits.iwaBody: Microsoft 365 is an incredibly powerful platform, but many companies only use 20–30% of its capabilities. Our Modern Workplace Audit analyzes in detail how your team uses tools like Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive, Outlook, and Copilot, and reveals opportunities for optimization that can transform your company's operational efficiency.

iwaEvaluatePoints.1: Adoption and use of Microsoft 365 tools
iwaEvaluatePoints.3: Integration with Copilot and intelligent automation

iwaReceivePoints.1: Detailed visual report with usage metrics and AI-detected patterns
iwaReceivePoints.2: Specific recommendations to improve collaboration and productivity
iwaReceivePoints.3: Adoption roadmap with prioritized quick wins

smartAudits.iwaCta: Request your Intelligent Modern Workplace Audit
smartAudits.isaBody: Security is no longer optional — it's a strategic priority. Our Intelligent Security Audit evaluates your Microsoft 365 environment, Azure, and Entra ID with an AI-powered lens, identifying vulnerabilities, detecting anomalies, and simulating real-world attack scenarios before they happen. We don't just deliver a report: we help you build a resilient digital security culture.

isaAnalyzePoints.1: Conditional Access and identity policies (Entra ID)
isaAnalyzePoints.3: Data protection and DLP (Data Loss Prevention)
isaAnalyzePoints.4: User permissions and privileged access control
isaAnalyzePoints.5: Threat detection and anomalous behavior patterns

isaReceivePoints.1: Comprehensive security diagnosis with risk maps
isaReceivePoints.3: Prioritized action plan to strengthen your security
isaReceivePoints.5: Training and awareness for your team
